messages.subject: i love google
messages.msgSnippet: and don t forget -- you can have a nice google toolbar on your browser.. it is so handy. i use it constantly.. hardly have to keep a favorites list with
messages.messageBody:
and don't forget -- you can have a nice google toolbar on your browser.. it is so handy. i use it constantly.. hardly have to keep a 'favorites' list with google right there.
L
----- Original Message -----
From: louisam1@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, August 09, 2002 12:48 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] www.google.com


<<www.google.com is the answer to this and many other questions!
With pictures, biographical information, commentary pro and con!>>

Sandra

You turned me onto google and it has become a favorite haunt for my
daughter and me. When we come across one of those "I would like to find
out more about that" moments we look at one another, grin and say
"Google!". The next space of time is taken up by the two of us huddled
around the computer munching on all the tidbits google has to offer.

Kris
